name: EditWarehouseTable
description:
Updates information for a specific warehouse table.

Use this tool to update details of a specific warehouse table within a project. Suitable for modifying table configurations or data schema.

parameters.name: warehouse_table_id
parameters.description: A UUID string identifying the data warehouse table to be updated.

value_schema.description: A UUID string identifying this data warehouse table.

parameters.name: project_id
parameters.description: The ID of the project you want to access. Obtainable via a call to /api/projects/.

value_schema.description: Project ID of the project you're trying to access. To find the ID of the project, make a call to /api/projects/.

parameters.name: warehouse_table_update_details
parameters.description: JSON object containing details to update the warehouse table, such as ID, name, format, credentials, etc.

format.description:
* `CSV` - CSV
* `CSVWithNames` - CSVWithNames
* `Parquet` - Parquet
* `JSONEachRow` - JSON
* `Delta` - Delta
* `DeltaS3Wrapper` - DeltaS3Wrapper
